key.name: logging-level
key.description: Controls how verbose the extension logging should be (debug, info, warn, error)

key.name: save-state
key.description: Whether to save and restore the visibility state on extension restart

key.name: default-visibility
key.description: Default visibility state when save-state is disabled

key.name: saved-visibility
key.description: The last visibility state when save-state is enabled

key.name: visible-items
key.description: List of panel items that should remain visible when hiding

key.name: all-items
key.description: List of all detected panel items (auto-updated)

key.name: auto-hide-enabled
key.description: Automatically hide panel items after a specified duration (Click Mode only)

key.name: auto-hide-duration
key.description: Duration in seconds before automatically hiding panel items (Click Mode)

key.name: animation-enabled
key.description: Use smooth fade animations when hiding/showing panel items

key.name: animation-duration
key.description: Duration of fade animations in milliseconds

key.name: custom-open-icon
key.description: Path to custom SVG icon for open state (empty uses default)

key.name: custom-close-icon
key.description: Path to custom SVG icon for close state (empty uses default)

key.name: interaction-mode
key.description: How to interact with the Veil indicator: 'click' for manual toggle or 'hover' for hover-to-expand

key.name: hover-duration
key.description: Duration in seconds before hiding items after hover ends (Hover Mode)
